name: Ember's Eyes
summary: Your eyes blaze with inner flame.
description:
Your eyes blaze with inner flame. You gain low-light vision, or you gain darkvision if your ancestry already has low-light vision.

Special If your ancestry has neither low-light vision nor darkvision, you can take this ancestry feat a second time to gain darkvision. You can't retrain out of this feat.Traits

Ifrit: Ifrits are planar scions descended from efreet.
